mapper.sql: select no, owner_no as ownerNo, city_no as cityNo, name, blind, tel, parking, wifi, smoking, pool, bbq, description, checkin, checkout, addr, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, imgurl from hotel
mapper.select: select name from hotel where owner_no=#{no}

select h.no as hotelNo, count(*) as roomCount from hotel h left outer join booking b on h.no=b.hotel_no where (trunc(start_date) between to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) or (trunc(end_date) between to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) group by h.no order by 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel (no, owner_no, city_no, name, blind, tel, parking, wifi, smoking, pool, bbq, description, checkin, checkout, addr, reg_date,imgurl) VALUES (#{no} , #{ownerNo}, #{cityNo}, #{name}, #{blind}, #{tel}, #{parking}, #{wifi}, #{smoking}, #{pool}, #{bbq}, #{description}, #{checkin},#{checkout},#{addr} ,sysdate,#{imgUrl})
